name: The Key to the Mansion
description:
Ava Reese and Gary the Enchanter are secretly married and live in a cave at the edge of an enchanted forest. Don’t worry - they have WI-FI.

Read novels by Ava Reese at https://www.amazon.com/stores/Ava-Reese/author/B09FTDLS76

Play more games by Gary the Enchanter at https://gary-the-enchanter.itch.io/ or follow him on Twitter: @EnchanterGary

Credits:

Writing - Ava Reese

Coding & Art - Gary the Enchanter

Music - https://musopen.org/

Icons - https://fontawesome.com/search?m=free&o=r
